category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIA_block_teamcenter_events
preference.preference_description: Disable/enable BOM event registration and server callback events reacting to BOM server changes. Possible values: - TRUE: The Teamcenter BOM events are not propagated to the client side - FALSE: No Teamcenter BOM events are blocked.
